name: Listening Gender – Quiz 3
description: Practice listening comprehension focusing on Gender vocabulary and phrases.

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
Listen to this. What is she saying?
Listen to this. What is she saying?
questions.explanation:
Trash
From the surname Poubelle, named after Eugène Poubelle, prefect of the Seine (i.e. chief administrator of Paris), who promulgated an ordinance in 1884 that all apartments should have trash cans.

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: D. Le beurre est tout mou.

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: B. La montagne est trop belle.
C. Le mont est assez beau.

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: A. La loi de la jungle
B. La loi de la ville
C. Les lois de la jungle
D. Ta loi de ta jungle
questions.correctAnswer: A. La loi de la jungle

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: A. Elles sont parties faire une randonnée.
B. Elles ne sont pas parties faire une randonnée.
C. Elles sont parties faire de la randonnée en montagne.
D. Ils sont partis faire une randonnée.
questions.correctAnswer: A. Elles sont parties faire une randonnée.

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: A. Sa casquette et sa short sont assorties.
B. Sa casquette et son short sont bien assortis.
C. Son casquette et sa short sont bien assorties.
D. Son casquette et son short sont bien assortis.
questions.correctAnswer: B. Sa casquette et son short sont bien assortis.
questions.explanation: Her hat and her shorts go well together

questions.question: Listen to this. What is she saying?
options: D. Je n'aime pas son assurance.
